title: Buttermilk chocolate cake with chocolate cream icing
ingredients: ['170g plain chocolate chips', '4 tablespoons water', '320g cake flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '175g butter, softened', '350g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '3 eggs', '225ml buttermilk', 'Chocolate whipped cream icing', '170g plain chocolate chips', '4 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons water', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '475ml whipping cream']
